title: Playing in China?
body:
Hi everyone I'm currently in China for the Lunar New Year and in my free time I usually like to play league of legends whilst I'm over here (The ping was usually around 150).

Every year so far I can connect to OCE without any problems but this year once it authenticates it just fails at the logging in stage.
Is there any specific reason to this or am I just in an area with crap internet?

Thanks!

replies.body:
Hi Parametrics, 

Try changing your DNS settings following [this guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#wq5) and see if that helps you connect.
